summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1481, for the improvement of Boylston Avenue, in the City of Seattle from East Union Street to East Denny Way, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15944 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
